resources.string: We don\'t know about any event which would increase your infection probability above average level.

For a short time frame we identified people in your environment how are infected by the virus or have high probability of being infected. It\'s recommended for you to keep distance from others for a week to stop spreading of the virus.

Somebody get infected who we detected in your environment for a longer time period or multiple times. It\'s recommended for you to keep distance from others for two weeks to stop spreading of the virus.
You reported infection, report being healthy if you already recovered or the previous report was accidental.
This is your unique id, which is used to identify you in our database. Keep it safe. There is no way to restore it, so keep it safe if you may want to recover your account later.
Explain why password is needed, and that it can no be recovered...
create an account to fight the virus

Send report if you are sure or that there is a very high probability that you are infected. Do it with care because your connections might be alerted and asked for self quarantine to prevent further spread of the infection.
Report infection based on self diagnose

What is this app?

COVID-19 Safety Tracker is a free contact tracing application to record your contacts anonimously, and in case of infection you can notify them without sharing your identity.



How can contact tracing help?

It helps to slow down the spread of the virus by notifying the potentially infected persons about the risk so they can pay special attention not to infect others even if they are symptomless.



How accurate it is?

The application has a few limitations so it\'s not 100% sure that you\'ll be notified if you met an infected person, and it\'s not sure that you are infected if you get high risk notifications. One limitation is that not everybody is using this app, and you will be notified only about infections reported through this app. Other limitation is based on the Bluetooth technology used by the application for contact tracing. Bluetooth is able to measure approximate distance between phones and determines the transmission probability only from the length and frequency of the contacts, no other factors can be taken into account.



Privacy policy

The application handles health records so protecting your privacy is important for us. This was an important design objective for the software. It identifies you only with a random number which is changed frequently so it\'s really hard to track anyones location over a longer time period. This identifier is recorded by nearby devices. If the owner of a contacted device reports infection over the app, the identifiers recorded by his phone in the previous two weeks will be shared with the app users, this way if one of your identifier is on this list, you will be notified.



Information is stored only on your phone and the random IDs of your contacts in the last two weeks are shared through Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) with other app users in case you submit infection. FCM might store these information for the duration needed for transmitting the messages.



Terms

The application is free to use. By using the application you accept that a random identifier is transmitted over Bluetooth which can be detected by other devices, to safeguard your privacy this random identifier is regenerated in about every 15 minutes. You also accept that you user the software as it is. And there is no warranty regarding any possible damage caused by the software in any direct or indirect way.
The two password is different, please enter the same password twice.
Error occured, please try it again.
Do you really want to delete your account? Your data will be deleted forever and can not be recovered.
No account key found, create a new account first.

When you are pretty sure that you have COVID-19 disease, but there is no chance to be tested, you can report it here. Please be aware that your report might triggers warning for others you met in the last two weeks. The alert is anonymous, your identity will be kept private, not even sent to any servers.

Your COVID-19 test was positive please report it. Do not report if you are already recovered and your are symptomless already for 2 weeks or longer. If you send report your contacts in the last two weeks will receive an anonymous alert. Your identity will be kept private, not even sent to any servers.
Something failed, pleas try again later.
Notifications from the COVID-19 contact tracing app.
Subscription to COVID-19 alerts failed, we will try again later.
